title: Are voting and user details on hover broken for anyone else?
body:
When you mouse over a username in a thread, you get a tooltip window with their summoner icon, ranked badges, level, that sort of thing. However, that isn't happening now. Instead, no tooltip window is created, nor is there even any indication that something's supposed to happen. It behaves like a plain link.

Attempting to vote on a thread or a comment results in no visible feedback as well, not even "so sad, not authorized." The vote buttons still light up when moused over, but nothing happens on click.

I've checked Chrome and Firefox on two accounts and observed the exact same behavior across the board. No errors show up in the dev console when I attempt these actions.

replies.body: Hey OP, I had the same issue (voting) today - you are not alone!
Works ok for me. Is there a particular sub-board or thread you noticed this?

> [{quoted}](name=Periscope,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=gA4h5iHZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2020-01-21T19:45:20.476+0000)
>
> Works ok for me. Is there a particular sub-board or thread you noticed this?

It was happening in several random threads I tried out. Seems to have resolved itself today, though.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=gA4h5iHZ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2020-01-21T20:14:30.704+0000)
>
> It was happening in several random threads I tried out. Seems to have resolved itself today, though.

Problems that fix themselves? That sounds like a problem for me, Peri.

> [{quoted}](name=Periscope,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=gA4h5iHZ,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2020-01-21T20:46:24.647+0000)
>
> Problems that fix themselves? That sounds like a problem for me, Peri.

Either it was temporary and no harm done or not temporary and a thread would help. Thanks for having a look!
